itemDescription: Flower, Sir Cyril Thomas (1879–1961), record scholar

wikipedia_page.main: Sir Cyril Thomas Flower,  (31 March 1879 – 10 August 1961) was a British historian and civil servant. He was the Deputy Keeper of the Public Records, the de facto head of the Public Record Office, between 1938 and 1947.

response: * Cyril Flower, 1st Baron Battersea (1843–1907), British politician and patron of art
* Cyril Flower (historian) (1879–1961), British historian and civil servant
